thread.title: Ex-Catalan leader Puigdemont released on bail

title: Ex-Catalan leader Puigdemont released on bail
text:
Ex-Catalan leader Puigdemont released on bail 6:53am EDT - 01:22 
Former Catalan leader Carles Puigdemont has been released on bail by a German court and been told he won't be extradited to Spain on charges of rebellion. But he could still find himself in front of Spanish courts. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Former Catalan leader Carles Puigdemont has been released on bail by a German court and been told he won't be extradited to Spain on charges of rebellion. But he could still find himself in front of Spanish courts. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2JpHVr8
